law.catch_line: If a grievant's principal unit has established a peer review panel for grievances in accordance with...
law.text:
If a grievant's principal unit has established a peer review panel for grievances in accordance with regulations adopted by the Secretary, the grievant may elect to:
waive Step Two and Step Three of the grievance procedure; and
submit the grievance to the peer review panel after Step One of the grievance procedure.
